Pre-Requisite libraries:
1. gapminder
2. tidyverse

Working with the Gapminder dataset

```{r setup, cache = FALSE, message = FALSE, warning = FALSE}
library(gapminder)
library(tidyverse)

# Get an overview of the gapminder dataset
str(gapminder)

# Type of objects in gapminder
class(gapminder)

gapminder

# Initial rows of dataset
head(gapminder)

# Last rows of dataset
tail(gapminder)

# Column names in dataset
names(gapminder)

# Number of rows
nrow(gapminder)

# Number of columns
ncol(gapminder)

# Number of rows x columns
dim(gapminder)

# statistical overview
summary(gapminder)

# visualizing dataset
plot(lifeExp ~ year, gapminder)

plot(lifeExp ~ gdpPercap, gapminder)

plot(lifeExp ~ log(gdpPercap), gapminder)
```
